member.param: Report, which is to be exported.
Describes pages range for the export.
A float value that sets the quality of exporting images. Default value is 1.
A float value that sets the resolution of exporting images. Default value is 100.
If embeddedFont is true then, when exporting, fonts of the report will be included in the resulting document.
If standardPdfFont is true then, when exporting, non-standard fonts of the report will be replaced by the standard fonts in resulting document.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebViewer.RequestTimeout

member.summary: Specifies the relative priority of report, stored in the system cache.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebViewer.AllowAutoUpdateCache
member.summary: Allows the viewer to update the cache automatically. The cache will be updated about once every three minutes if there are no actions in the viewer.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates that the viewer will use relative or absolute URLs.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebViewer.PortNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which specifies the port number to use in the URL. A value of 0 defines automatic detection. A value of -1 removes the port number.
